original_text: Then he took his eldest son that should have reigned in his stead, and offered him for a burnt offering upon the wall. And there was great indignation against Israel: and they departed from him, and returned to their own land.
korean_text: 이에 자기 왕위를 이어 왕이 될 맏아들을 데려와 성 위에서 번제를 드린지라 이스라엘에게 크게 격노함이 임하매 그들이 떠나 각기 고국으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: Then he took his eldest son
that should have reigned in his stead
and offered him for a burnt offering
And there was great indignation against Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이스라엘에 대한 큰 분노가 있었다

sentences.original_text: and returned to their own land
